themes: perceived lack of transparency in recipient selection
concerns about merit or productivity of grant recipients
suggestion for deeper evaluation of applicants
key_phrases: a further dive into the recipients seems to be necessary
the few I heard of who received grants were not as established or putting out as much work as the many who applied
barriers_identified: perception that less established or less productive applicants are being funded over more established or active ones
solutions_proposed: conduct a further dive into the recipients
